EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Book your Venous Blood Test Clinic Visit with our partner Randox ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Dear {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
Thanks for your recent Blood Test and Clinic Visit order.
Please click the button below to book your appointment with our partner Randox Health. Please note that you do not need to wait for a blood test kit to be delivered to you - Randox will have a test kit for you at the clinic.
When booking, you will be asked to confirm your Date of Birth and Surname. You will also need to enter the code below in full:
{{{Blood_Test__c.Name}}}
Click 'Continue' twice, then you can search for your preferred clinic location, and select from the available appointments, and complete your booking.
Book Here < https://booking.randoxhealth.com/booking?c=uk&service=AT787 >
If you have any questions, please contact bloods@optimale.co.uk or reply to this email.
Thanks,
Optimale
Optimale Ltd, 71-75 Shelton Street, London, WC2H 9JQ, United Kingdom
